statements: SELECT * FROM WildlifeData WHERE location='Africa';
SELECT species,population FROM WildlifeData WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT id,species,conservation_status FROM WildlifeData WHERE population > 10000 AND conservation_status='Vulnerable';
SELECT * FROM WildlifeData WHERE species='Elephant' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM WildlifeData WHERE conservation_status='Critically Endangered';
SELECT species, population FROM WildlifeData WHERE location='Africa' ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT * FROM WildlifeData WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' ORDER BY species
SELECT location, COUNT(DISTINCT species) AS species_count FROM WildlifeData GROUP BY location ORDER BY species_count DESC
SELECT AVG(population) AS avg_population, MIN(population) AS min_population, MAX(population) AS max_population FROM WildlifeData GROUP BY species
SELECT * FROM WildlifeData WHERE population > 10000 AND conservation_status='Threatened'
SELECT * FROM Wildlifepopulations WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT id, species_name, population_size FROM Wildlifepopulations WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM Wildlifepopulations WHERE conservation_status IN ('Threatened', 'Vulnerable') ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE success_rate >= 0.75;
SELECT id, species_name, location, action_taken FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Wildlifepopulations WHERE conservation_status='Endangered'
SELECT * FROM Wildlifepopulations WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC

SELECT id, species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM Wildlifepopulations INNER JOIN ConservationEfforts ON Wildlifepopulations.species_name = ConservationEfforts.species_name WHERE ConservationEfforts.success_rate > 80
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM ConservationEfforts GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT species_name, location, action_taken, success_rate FROM ConservationEfforts ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT species, population, location, last_observation_date FROM WildlifePopulation;
SELECT * FROM ConservationEfforts;
SELECT species, population FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT conservation_org, effort_type, budget FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM PopulationAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE species = 'Tiger';
SELECT conservation_org, budget FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE effort_type = 'Reforestation' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT species, population, location FROM WildlifePopulation ORDER BY location ASC, population DESC;
SELECT CA.analysis_id, CA.species, CA.analysis_type, PA.analyst FROM ConservationEfforts CA INNER JOIN PopulationAnalysis PA ON CA.conservation_org = PA.analysis_id;
SELECT species, population, location, last_observation_date FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE population > 1000 AND location = 'Asia';
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT species_id, conservation_measure FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_effectiveness = 'High';
SELECT * FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM species INNER JOIN population_data ON species.species_id = population_data.species_id WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT conservation_measure, conservation_effectiveness FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_effectiveness = 'High' ORDER BY conservation_measure;
SELECT * FROM habitat_info WHERE habitat_type IN ('Forest', 'Grassland') ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM animal_data;
SELECT species, population_count FROM animal_data ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT site_name, last_monitored_date FROM monitoring_sites WHERE site_type = 'Protected';
SELECT * FROM animal_data ORDER BY species ASC, population_count DESC
SELECT species, location FROM animal_data WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered'
SELECT project_name, budget FROM conservation_projects WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT population_count, year FROM population_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY population_count DESC
SELECT scientist_name, email FROM research_scientists WHERE expertise_area = 'Ecology'
